component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

item.itemvalue: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor
Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor & Play

task.summary: up and running with 2018 but editor still looks like it has broken prefabs
Seperated out state management so that it can be held on client and server using the same objects
Got the gameboard and hand state preserved on the server as well as the client.
Got the cards in the hand workign well, moving on to being able to change the size of GRIDXDIM and GRIDYDIM

Clicking on player hand cards and boardgame cards working for limited tests run so far. More extensive testing is required
*** Known Bugs *** No animation for the callerboard cards Caller can click on boardgame cards and affect play, they should not be allowed to do this unless using a hand card that grants such powers All caller cards can be used again at the start of the next turn

MESSAGE.value: up and running with 2018 but editor still looks like it has broken prefabs
Seperated out state management so that it can be held on client and server using the same objects
Got the gameboard and hand state preserved on the server as well as the client.
Got the cards in the hand workign well, moving on to being able to change the size of GRIDXDIM and GRIDYDIM

*** Breaking Change *** Tried again to get client and server to communicate card status using cardID really need to update all messages to use serialized objects like the cards in the hands do. Also finally figured that Rider and Unity are not playing nicely. For some reason I have to compile in Unity now to see any changes introduced by Rider. Lost a lot of time chasing my tail on why updates I made in Rider did not appear in the build.

Clicking on player hand cards and boardgame cards working for limited tests run so far. More extensive testing is required
*** Known Bugs *** No animation for the callerboard cards Caller can click on boardgame cards and affect play, they should not be allowed to do this unless using a hand card that grants such powers All caller cards can be used again at the start of the next turn

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Clicking on player hand cards and boardgame cards working for limited tests run so far. More extensive testing is required
*** Known Bugs *** No animation for the callerboard cards Caller can click on boardgame cards and affect play, they should not be allowed to do this unless using a hand card that grants such powers All caller cards can be used again at the start of the next turn
